content.detailedDescription: It came down from the sky behind me as i was driving along in minnesota by mylake cabin. it has orange lights and they were bright. the next thing i know itlanded. so i stopped and was curious. because i do believe inextra-terrestrials. so i got out and then it got out of the space ship. i wastrying to use telepathy to say i was wanting no harm. just then it paralyzed meand i couldnt move. all i could do was stand. then all of the sudden he took mewith great strength to his spaceship. i was there on a table next and i guessthey were probing me. it was unbelievable. then the next thing i know was i wasin home and in bed. i thought i had dreamt it all but then the memories cameback to me 1 day later. i think they put something in my nose but im not quitesure. i hope this is enough for you and wish you well with all of your findings.
content.summary: I really got abducted by an alien

content.detailedDescription: We were hiking in the desert hills on saugus. the sky was cloudy  cristinatripped. she looked up and saw a blue thing falling. she quickly moved out ofthe way. we thought it was a ball, but it was way too big. the blue bubblyobject fell and bounced back up to the sky never to return again. we normally donot believe in things of this nature but we believe what we see with our owneyes.

1. sitting outside on my front steps around 1115 pm2. the brightness3. comet4. followed it across the sky and was not believing what i was seeing.5. made a path across the sky in a line was very brightup close, was movingextremely fast, faded as it got father away. it was there, then it was gonealmost as fas as we saw it.6.Was moving so fast, faded. the 2nd thing smaller, was moving behind it, itseemed farther away, but on the same path.
My boyfriend

Object reported  as a fiery meteor, straight tragectory, fragmenting, reportedto faa office, news media and law enforcement agencies within 100 mile area. ispoke with a commercial pilot and he confirmed the object was very highaltitude, but was a classic meteor in decay, put on spectacular light show. thismufon f.I. sees no need to follow up. i file this report so that subsequentreports of ufo may not have merit. object was most likely a meteor. k.S. 9682

I was at home watching tv at about 130 or so when the tv started to actfunny,shortly after that i noticed a flash of light through the living roomwindow as i looked out i saw a few more flashes through the trees.I live about200 yards away from the river so at first i thought it was a spot light from oneof the many barges that pass by but the light was not the same as i had seenbefore from them.Most of the time you can hear the sound of the engine from thembut there was no sound at all,very still out.So i walked about 70 yards up agravel drive to a clearing that over looks the river and into ky.Ther were noboats or anything that i could see or hear.Thats when i could see a faint glowacross the river into ky.My first thought was that it was some mil aircraft thati have seen now and then flying along the river and the surounding area.Butthere was no sound and it really dident look like any kind of aircraft.As iwatched there seemed to be 4 or 5 in the same area but not in any kind offormation the lights changed from a dim blue to a dim red then to a bright whitethis happend in about 3mins or so and did so 7 or 8 times in the span that i sawthem.But not at the same time or in any pattern.They moved from down into thetrees up to what looked like mabe 800 feet but hard to tell.They did seem tocome closer but never seemed to get out above the river.I watched them for aabout 30min or so then they started to move east in and out of the trees when ilost sight of them.I know that it sure dident look like anything that i had seenbefore and i havent seen anything strange since.

1 east bound buss from sanmarcos texas to houston texas2 northern horizon lit up like a city, as 20 lights in v formation flew over3 looked like aircraft, but as they aproached, we saw it wasnt ours.4 extreme excitement and concern for all of usthey continued over us to the south and a split second later, everyone wastotally quiet and stareing strait ahead, as tho they seen nothing.5 20 bright lights in v formation went from n.Horizon to s. horizon in less than30 seconds, in a strait path directly over the buss at high altitude.6 the lights continued south over the flat plains, and disapeared over thehorizon.
content.summary: 20 bright lights in v formation very high  fast

content.detailedDescription: This is not my story perse. but i do have the audio tape of the fellow who hadthe visitors for 3 12 days while they were fixing some equipment. this is1950......Before computers. but the description looks like a computer screen andprintout of the ailing ufo vehicle.They were humanoid. the only differnce wasthe smaller hands and sborter arms.They spoke with gutteral sounds mixed withclicks. lots more to tell

Object first observed in easetern sky. circled clowly in a northeasternlydirection while stopping and on occasion jumping. at one point a second objectstreaked across the sky passed the first but dissapearing immediatleythereafter. we had two video cameras trained on the object for twnety minutes orso and have observed the footage. the streaking object was captured on tape aswell. the sky was clear blue. there are several good zooms on the object wherean obvious shape is apparent. there are both tripod and handheld shots of theobject as we had time to fish the tripod out before the object disappeared.Frame-by-frame reveals several interesting shots of what appears to be a disc orelliptically-shaped object. it moved higher and farther away until we couldntsee it. these tapes are pretty good if yall want em.
content.summary: Orange glowing saucer on videotape over austin tx

content.detailedDescription: Me matthew borden, my fiancee justine olivares and her 2 children were driving down hwy 72 westbound to cherokee alabama to do some star gazing bc i am into amateur astronomy. it was right about sunset the sun had already went behind the horizon, me and justine both saw an redish pinkish glowing arrowhead shaped object hovering in the sky to the right side of the hwy both of us said at the same time what the hell is that we watched it for a minute going down the road it remained motionless i pulled over in a church parking lot to the left side of the hwy and the object turned from vertically up and down to horizontally. i was going to get my binoculars from my bag and noticed children playing in the parking lot so i went on down the hwy and turned into the old orba plant driveway, as i was getting out of my jeep to get my binoculars the pointed end of the object turned our direction, altho it was moving the redish glow which i thought was a reflection of the sun never moved the glow stayed constant as i was digging thru my telescope bag for the binoculars my fiancee yelled it's moving i looked and the object appeared to be moving in reverse away from us slowly i got my binoculars out and was removing them from the pouch and walking around to drivers side to avoid being hit by cars, i had just got to the side ofthe car and it vanished. it didn't fly off or move it just vanished right in front of my eyes...Me and my fiancee were breathing heavy the kids wanted to know why they were looking at us. but other than being a little scared no one had any physical effects. any information you can give me as to what it was would be very appricated..Most importantly will it come back..And should i be worried that it noticed us thank you
content.summary: We saw an arrowhead shaped glowing object

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv and the tv cep turning on and off the lites were dimming iturn on some music thinking it is a surge and my cd player stops workingthen therefrigearater stops working i look out side and then my dog starts barkingmybird is trying to bite me and i see a big ornge ball take off and start zigzaging around and not going aroundso i g and get my cancorder and i come backwith a brand new batery i turn it on and after a secondthe batery indacater gosedownlike the batery is geting dranedthe camera is dead and i take out mysellpone to call my friend to tell him i saw a ufoand my phone is lo on bateryand diedby that time it zoomed away my bird and my dog ceteled down. i feltprety calm during the event

I woke up at approx. 430 in the am which is very odd for me seeing as i am avery heavy sleeper. i looked out of my window and to the se i saw the ufo. itwas a single light that would pulse white, then orange, then white, then orange,ect. it appeared to bounce, almost, back and forth, back and forth. it was veryodd indeed. i observed this light for about 5-8 secounds then expirencedoverwelming tiredness. i then was back to a deep sleep almost instinly.
content.summary: Light that flashed from white to orange from white

content.detailedDescription: I was getting into the car when i saw a bright beautiful green object.I thoughtit was maybe part of a rocket booster.I was facinated by the object. after itwas gone i became curious and wanted to know what it was. it was a lamp shaped,glowing, green object with four dripping balls of fire infront of the object. iwas unable to see if the dripping balls of fire were connected to the objectbecause the sky was so dark. it went out of my vision behind mountians leavingtwo flashes of bright light occuring sometime shortly after.
content.summary: Ufo reporting in priest river, idaho

content.detailedDescription: Not certain of the date, oct. 1, 2 or 3rd. about 6pm, i was walking my dog. i heard jet aircraft and looked west at the sound. i saw this luminious cloud with the aircraft flying by it. my first thought was ha, someone called in a ufo report on a lenticular cloud. then i was puzzled because the cloud was too low and too bright to be a lenticular cloud in a beautiful, clear blue sky. one of the planes i could tell it was a jet fighter by the radically swept back wings then seemed to fly straight at the cloud and it surprised me as the cloud was bright and seemed like a form of energy or something. as the fighter got close, the angles changed, and the plane went 150 to 200 ft. below the cloud. the clouds edges were very defined, not fuzzy, and it was about 4 1/2 times as long as it was thick, and almost horizontal when first witnessed. the color was something i have never seen, possibly best described as a silver blue. the color was perfectly even throughout, not lighter or brighter along the edges, nor darker in the center. it was bright in the daytime sky. no additional lights were seen. after the close flyby of the plane, the cloud began a slow rotation from the horizontalto a vertical position, taking 30 sec. to a minute, and began moving in a straight line to the west, on its edge or end. i assumed it to be disk shaped while looking at it, but realized later it could have been a disk or triangle seen edge on, or even a cigar shape. the lines along the length were very straight and the ends were curved. it was at least six times as long as the fighters flying close by. one of the planes left the site and flew near my house at about 1500 ft. altitude. i looked closely at the plane and identified it as a dark charcoal-gray colored f-16. the f-16s heading was e-se. there were still two f-16s flying back and forth from north to south between me and the cloud while the cloud continued moving west. the air was calm, at least at ground level. the other two f-16s never flew towards the cloud, always back and forth behind it, seemingly checking the atmosphere the cloud passed through, staying14 to 12 mile behind it. the event lasted at least 15 to 20 minutes. i watched the cloud until it was very small, bb sized, and the f-16s were still flying back and forth behind it. i could no longer make out the planes, but could still see their exhaust highlighted by the setting sun, appearing orange-yellow. the cloud remained a silver-blue like color, with no hint of orange. it was by then very low above

I was parking my car at my home when i sow a big green disc about the size of awagon weel, it was briht green and has flame araund the disc of  ligth grren at first it was steady and abaut 30 secon or so it start ocsilaten right and leftand went up disapiring on the skay leaven a tail of light green behiand plasepardon my english . very thruli  rolando casallas
content.summary: I sow  a very big disc on pine wood at miami flori

content.detailedDescription: Obvious light bending object-objects to hide themselves.  easily seen with eye but much more pronounced with ruby coated binoculars.  the objects viewed just above treetops.  when looked at straight on through binoculars the objects is discolored, transparant, very blurry with the tendency to slide your vision off of it to one side or the other.  often trees are subject to highwind behavior below the stationary object.  also noteworthy are birds that fly into-past object and thus out of my sight till flown past the object, or birds seeming to pop out of nowhere from the blurry area-field of somekind around this thing.  the birds that seem to me to interact with these objects are either large hawk like birds or smaller dark birds that don't seem to flap just kinda zoom or dodge behind trees or other sight blocking things house, land contour, barn the hawks in pictures i taken have a circular radiance around them perhaps a 1-foot overlap of birds physical size. the only other anomalies that usually are present at viewing times are bird like faint shadows that dart at high speed to and from the cloaked object, from the object these faint shadows just impact into the ground and vanish with no thump or sound or mark. i can notice these my opinion light bending objects out of the corner of my eye and then the air just looks dirty viewed straight on.  im not pshycic or anything just observant. i think this is just military stuff or things that exists at the fringe of our eyesight. compass usually twirls about.  thank you for this outlet. 10-16-2003  639pm
content.summary: Signs of light bending to hide whatever.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my house enjoying the beautiful sunny october afternoon when inoticed a blimp leaving the the vicinity of the oakland as game , i watched asthe blimp flew overhead and thats when i caught a shiny bright ball about 2degrees to the right of the bilmp . at first it was stationary , but then itstarted to cruise north easterly. i observed it thinking it was maybe a militaryplane or something, i was extremely curious at this point because after a fewseconds it just stopped and it stayed in the same spot in the sky for about 15or 20 minutes , thats when i totally realized it wasnt an ordinary aircraft. theobject resembled a pulsating star but, in the middle of the day  no it wasnt theplanet mars  this was way different in appearance

1. standing on porch smoking cigarette.2. the brightness and location of the lights.3. ther should not be lights in this location.4. just watch until out of sight.5. three lights forming a triangle, moving very slowly.6. went behind a hill.Here is a full account of this sighting.Three bright lights with no sound.It was 530am on the morning of sept. 13, 2002. i was stand on the porch of themotel i was staying at. the porch has a clear view to the w through nnw. i waslooking in a wnw direction when i saw three bright white lights in a triangularshape or formation. i estimate these lights to be 12 of a mile from my location.The lights appeared to be moving in a nw direction at the speed of a smallaircraft 120 kts or less. they were at about 20 degrees above the horizion. asthe light were moving away from me the front light went out. i dont know if thisdue to the light being turn off or if it became obstructed by part of the craft.I can not say this was one craft or three as it was to dark to see. the lightsdisappeared behind a hill to my nw.There was no noise from these lights. the morning air was still and quite, nodogs, no birds and no traffic noise that could have covered the sound of anaircraft engine.The dam located not far from my location is a hydroelectric dam. after lookingon a map these lights may have followed the power lines to the dam from the seand departed the area following the power lines to the nw.
content.summary: Three white lights forming a triangle

content.detailedDescription: The night of the big blackout in nyc, i was with some other people who weretrapped in manhattan,and couldnt get to their homes in the other borougs. wewere at 35 great jones st. i think thats the exact addresson the roof, which is6 stories high. there were about 6 of us there, all adults. it was a hot day andit was dark out, so we were just trying to make the best of it. i saw an objectflying more or less parallel to the roof. it looked, if i had to describe it,like two a really big black hefty garbage bag, just sailing by. it made nosound, and it was going straight across at a decent speed... so it had to havesome sort of motor. i mentioned it to the others who saw it, and then we watchedit. as it floated away from us, hundreds of tiny lights inside it startedblinking but very faintly... they were like the small christmas lights. thatsit. then it left our view.  i guess it to be some sort of government thing outthere sniffing the air. but it wasnt some sort of home made prank... because bythe way it went straight across with no sound, it was strange.

content.summary: Huge black morphing monoliths change before your eye

content.detailedDescription: I was standing out side faceing west looking at an object that i belived to be abright star, i noticed white, redm and green light emmiting from this object, iwhent back in side, and heard lincoln county sheriff dispatch a call of a u.F.Oin the hawk point area 8 miles west of troy mo.63379, i told my wife patriciaabout the object in the western sky, and we both went outside to look. i carry apair of 7x35 binoculars in my truk, at which time i was observing this objectthrou them. this object had been stationary for over 20 mimutes, as i wasobserving this object, i could hear a jet liner flying towards the object, icould see the jet liner was goint to pass with in 7 miles of the object, whenthe jet liner came closer to this object, the object whent dark, as the jetliner passed by, after about 4 seconds, the object reapeared lower in thewestern horizon still stationary, the object would shut down its lights, andmove ferther west, light it self up again, until i lost sight of it below thewestern horizon, my wife observed most of this with the naked eye.

Standing out side at or about 8pm looking west north west at what i thought wasa pulsating star, emitting red ,white,and green lights.The object was stationaryfor about 25 minutes, i saw a comercial air liner traveling twards the object,when the jet airliner was with in about 7 miles of the object. ir  the objectturned off its lights and when it illumenated it self again, it appeared lowerin the westen sky, repeating this same action until it disapeared below thewestern horizon.The jet liner stayed a stedy course west noth west never veringoff course.
content.summary: Multi colored lights in one position for over 30 m

content.detailedDescription: 1 looking at stars.23 thought they where two planets close to each other.4amazed and a little stupid that i didnt look at them better.5 noticed lights,thought it a little wierd i had not noticed them before. turned to watchaircraft flying in to d.I.A.Landing pattern. turned back one planet was gone,the other started to fade, turned to a color like a cigarette cherry and gotsmaller. then arched about a half inch at arms length and dissapeared.  now, inoticed about the same type of event a couple days earlier. a little different.Thought you might find that a little interesting also. this is a rural area, thenight sky really sticks out. i see satilites, falling stars and landing lightsall the time. real familiar stuff to me. these events are way different.

We were walking back from the store. my daughter is an astronomy buff so she waswatching the sky. she said look at the strange plane. i looked and a light inthe sky was traveling very fast from the north. it was soon joined by two otherlights. one from the sw and one from the ne as they flew over our area theyjoined together into one object and flew out towards the atlantic. normally iwould not have thought about writing but they moved so fast. they cleared ourview from north to se in just about 6 or 7 seconds and then when they lookedlike they became one object my daughter insisted i tell someone.
content.summary: Three glowing lights form into one big light

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bedroom watching t.V. and my then wife started shouting for me tocome outside and see what was flying overhead above the house. the object wasvery enormous, football feild size, and jennifer was standing outside with herbrother jesse and his girlfriend nicole. i was a police officer then and ireported the object to the local police department.  the object moved from thekeams canyon direction toward the bittersprings area in a matter of 15-20 min.Very quiet moving and this was a daylight sighting around 5 pm in the evening intown with a population of about 8000 people. as soon as i reported it we saw 2military jets follow the object and later 2 helicopters flying from theflagstaff, arizona area toward the page, arizona area after the oject.  i knewit was a ufo because nothing in the world is rectangular and can fly.  i andeveryone around were stunned with silence, unfortunately no videocamera orcamera at the time, i was too excited too se my very first ufo we watched theobject fade away into the distance.  the bottom of the object had what lookedlike mechanical parts, pipes, conduits, boxes, etc.  i can only describe it aslooking at the undercarriage of a car.  the heighth of the object seemed toappear to be 2 stories high, very rectangular, with sharp corners.  no wings orpropellers. i am randy.  i have a grandmother whom does not speak a word ofenglish, she is a novajo elder whom lives in the woods alone with mygrandfather. she stated that she has seen the new people who live in the heavenson several occassions. she was asked during a family gathering, by my uncle,what she does alone the woods to pass her time each day, to everyones shockingsurprise she said she waves to the star people that land in the woods sometimesduring the day while she tends the folk.  she stated that they only wave to herfrom the distance and they appear to look like children, she was given a sheetof paper and asked to draw the beings and she drew a grey. she asked us whatthey were and who they are, our only explaination to her is that they live faraway beyond the stars and that she is lucky to be choosen to see one up close.Some of our family members have seen many  silvery flying disks in the navajomountain area, especially near the canyon near my granparents place.  thank you,bye.
content.summary: Saw a rectangular football feild sized noiseless c

content.detailedDescription: At about 9pm last night a friend and i were sitting outside having drinks on thedeck of the sky bar on sunset boulevard in los angeles at about 9pm.  we werefacing south looking out at the city when my friend pointed to his right andsaid jokingly, here comes a ufo.  i looked to the west and there was an objectapproaching on the horizon.It was lights in a v-formation heading directly toward the bar.  the lights werenot bright but muted.  the formation looked like a flock of geese.At first i thought is was some sort of plane heading to us.  then as itapproached i noticed that the rear lights in the formation were in constantmotion switching positions.  this caused me to think that maybe the lights fromthe city were simply reflecting off the underside of a flock of birds in flight.The lights approached and then flew directly over the bar.  whatever theobjectswaswere completely silent and the rear lights appeared to be in constantmotion swithching positions.  the air was slightly hazy so it was impossible totell if the lights were a part of single object or each an independent aircraft. whatever it was relatively large and the open end of the v appeared to be thewidth of a normal aircraft wingspan.  i have no idea on the height of the objectbut would guess 5,000-7,000 feet.I stood to follow the object over the bar as it continued northwest and thenlost sight of it as it passed over the hotel and beyond.My initial reaction was to look for a logical explanation but none could befound.  i live in texas and have seen flocks of birds in v formation millions oftimes and these were not birds.  also the motion of the rear lights was almostmechanical not the motion of birds.It was not a normal plane because it was completely silent and the lights werein motion, something that doesnt even happen with the v shaped stealth aircraft. my friend and i went through various scenarios but none fit, it was trulyunexplainable.Its my opinion that what we saw was not from outerspace but some new technologyfrom our government.  the direction of the craft was from the pacific headingnorthwest toward nevada.  this may seem far fetched but i think the governmenthas created some new means of moving aircraft without noise and without normalaircraft parts.  i think the moving lights were somehow being used to stablizethe aircraft as it flew.I am at a loss and am wondering if anyone else saw something in the air over losangeles on the night of october 14th.

I travel to the pinacate area,craters,lava flows and sand dunes,wiht mi wife,andshes cousins,in the peaks of pinacate,a lot little lihgt balls,dancing in sky, isee beacuse i drive, all togethers. we stop the car,i can remenber exactly, 5 or10 minutes is incredible, the lights moven inside , in the mountain, we feel,wear nervous and excited .I hear,people in the 60,s nasa comming here, to test,instruments ,beacuse the ground is similar in the moon.More 400 cinder cones inthe area.

I was standing at the light rail stop waiting for the next train. i was lookingslightly up at the time. the time approx. 1900-1800. distance to object -notsure.  i was looking at the dark clear sky an i noticed a dark shape movingslowly past.  the overall shade of it was very slightly darker than thebackround nite sky but just enough to see it pass in front of stars.  it was todark a color and far away to discern its shape.  it had either some kind ofwindow or port out of which was lighter in color or dimly lit which is how inoticed it also.  i didnt know what it was. i was thinking it could have beena plane but there were no lights on it like a plane has. i was thinking it wasa ufo and i was overjoyed at seeing it and thought it was cool.  it moved veryslowly. across from me in the same direction was a light rail station light.Which started to obscure my vision of the object. i looked away to cross tracksand move away from that light to get a better view.  but on returning my eyesto the spot where it was i could no longer find it. i only viewed the object forabout 5 seconds moving a total distance at arms length of about one hand widthapproximately.

I was in the bedroom,putting clothes away, and talking to my husband when i wasdrawn to the bedroom window.  i saw what looked like a rather large orange starlow on the eastern horizion.  only no large orange stars appear there any timeof the year.  i stood and watched it for about three to five minutes.  itappeared to get larger and was moving in my direction.I got very excited and ran out of the room and went outside.  this was ratherodd behavior so my husband followed me.  it flew right over our heads.  therewas no sound and you could almost walk under it and keep pace. this seemedamazing because of the sheer mass of it.  then from the about the same directiona small fast jet appeared out of nowhere and flew on a parallel path,at a much higher altitude and flew out of sight.  you could heat the jet.  thelarge uap just floated slowly and silently along. then it disappeared behind amountain.We live in a major flight corridor so i am familiar with all types of aircraftflying overhead. military and civilian  especially at night because i am astargazer.Strange thing, almost a year later, new years day, about 3am, our neighbors leftour house after spending the night watching movies.  we watched them across thestreet as they walked home and all of a sudden they were pointing to the sky. myhusband and i went outside and watched the same type of uap, on almost the sametrajectory, floating overhead.  strangely i said it is just our resident alien. no, we had not had any alcohol or anything else that night and the movie wewatched was casper.  our neighbors were two adults and a ten year old child.The flight path is more accurately ese going nnw. both times.  my reaction thesecond time was almost like this was so redundant that it was almost not worthwatching, as opposed to my first time when i was so excited.This is not the first strange thing i have seen here, but it is the only one iwill talk about.  and it has taken me this long to report itthe years might be wrong either 94 and 95 or 95 and 96, but the month is thesame and the times are the same, and the event was unforgettable, the first tme.
content.summary: Slow moving triangle uap that was chased by a smal

content.detailedDescription: March 9th, 2003 as i was doing surveillance on some anhydrous tanks.  at 0030hours i observed some lights that i thought was an airplane coming from thenorth heading in my direction.  the  object kept getting closer and closer to mylocation.  i was just about to move the patrol car, because i thought the objectwas going to crash.  at this time the lights stopped and hovered for a fewseconds, then in the snap of a fingure it was gone.  i did not say anything tomy ride-a-long, basically because i did not know what to say.  but before icould think of anything to say my ride-a-long says did you justsee them lights over there.  the lights where white in color most of the timebut would show other faint colors, and was in the shape of a triangle.  thelights were not flashing, and i could not hear anything coming from the objectwhich was about 200 yards away.Also about a month ago, another police officer who had a possible drunk stopped,saw the same thing hovering a few miles from their location.
